item.description: If you know how to get to AMC's Cardigan Lodge Parking Lot we can meet there at 10 AM.Cardigan Lodge is hard to find.Take I93 north to exit 23,go down the exit ramp and make a left onto NH104 west to Bristol.At the traffic light in town make a right into the parking lot for the N.H. Liquor Store.We will meet there at 9:30 AM and caravan to Cardigan Lodge.We will hike the Manning Trail to the summit of Firescrew Mtn. (3064')and the Mowglis Trail to the summit of Mount Cardigan(3155'),returning via the Clark and Holt Trails.Above treeline hiking on Firescrew and Cardigan,views in all directions. 5.7 miles round trip,6 hours estimated time----Steve----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MODERATE HIKE-MOUNT CARDIGAN
